channel.title: Moparscape's Botkilling Team
channel.description:
So today I finally decided to buy a Polypore staff and go bot killing and I found that it is AMAZINGLY profitable so I've decided to start a team. So here is the requirements and recommendations. [center][b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b] 80 Magic
[b][u]Gear:[/u][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fxw8n.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/GM9ZA.png[/img] This is minimal risk and provides most GP/PH. After full teleport to Edgeville, bank and run back.
[center][b][u]Current Members:[/u][/b] Stupit - Equilibrate [/center]

item.title: Moparscape's Botkilling Team
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:32, topic:437558”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540264.msg3957016#msg3957016 date=1332864913]

I don’t have 80 mage but I can certainly dds spec with my 95/96 strength and low combat level

combat levels are essential in bot killing. The bots with higher combat will have more bones than the others.

how do you consider that? the low level green dragon killing bots don’t get harassed by high level pkers.

It’s a multi-combat zone, so whoever does the most damage to the green dragon gets the loot, and higher combat levels often have higher str levels so
[/quote]
but you can’t kill the lower level ones hence the need for a lower level pker, however I cannot go there being in the mid range level alone as other pkers will find me an easy target[/quote]
I’m only 92+4 combat and I don’t find anybody lower than 77ish there. Most of the people are 88-104. x)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape's Botkilling Team
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:30, topic:437558”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=540264.msg3957014#msg3957014 date=1332864817]

I don’t have 80 mage but I can certainly dds spec with my 95/96 strength and low combat level

combat levels are essential in bot killing. The bots with higher combat will have more bones than the others.

how do you consider that? the low level green dragon killing bots don’t get harassed by high level pkers.
[/quote]
It’s a multi-combat zone, so whoever does the most damage to the green dragon gets the loot, and higher combat levels often have higher str levels so :)[/quote]
but you can’t kill the lower level ones hence the need for a lower level pker, however I cannot go there being in the mid range level alone as other pkers will find me an easy target

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:15, topic:437558”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540264.msg3956391#msg3956391 date=1332797534]

hurrr… you could make so much more money if you didn’t use shark… and all you need a polypore staff and a anti drag sheild, you don’t need the rest off the shit.

most of the bots use whips and auto-retaliate so they hit you 100-215 quite often (i pray melee)
[/quote]
then why not use monks? xD save your self some geepees[/quote]
I have 99 fishing and I fish my food. Monks are a pain in the ass to get to

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape's Botkilling Team
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

How is this profitable? The bots don’t have anything worth the trouble apart from the occasional dragon bone or two. You’re better off killing revenants yourself.

In 4 kills I got a full inventory of 84k in a matter of minutes. That’s a lot faster than killing the dragons yourself.

Read full topic
